column1: Uchi////Having recently returned from living in Osaka Japan
column2: I had to give in to the hype and try Uchi. Every dish was world class and the sushi was on par with what i've had in Japan. Bit pricey
column3: but that's what you get if you want authentic japanese sushi. This place is not your average sushi restaurant. Having worked in the service industry myself I got to say they run a tight ship
column4: all the servers were well informed and very knowledgable about their menu.
